script:
# script "lisp"
# background "Manga_back"
# bgm "stop"
# bottonsout 0 0
# frameout 0 0
# textwindow "close"
# imageset 0 "Manga_logo"
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imagelayer 0 8
# imageset 1 "Manga_09_1_0"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 8
# imagescale 1 0.9 0
# imageset 2 "Manga_09_1_1"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 10
# imagescale 2 0.9 0
# imageset 3 "Manga_09_1_2"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 10
# imagescale 3 0.9 0
# imageset 4 "Manga_09_2_0"
# imagealpha 4 0 0
# imagelayer 4 8
# imagescale 4 0.9 0
# imageset 5 "Manga_09_2_1"
# imagealpha 5 0 0
# imagelayer 5 10
# imagescale 5 0.9 0
# imageset 6 "Manga_09_2_2"
# imagealpha 6 0 0
# imagelayer 6 10
# imagescale 6 0.9 0
# imageset 7 "Manga_09_2_3"
# imagealpha 7 0 0
# imagelayer 7 10
# imagescale 7 0.9 0
# imageset 8 "Manga_09_3_0"
# imagealpha 8 0 0
# imagelayer 8 8
# imagescale 8 0.9 0
# waitandnext 0.5

;;タイトル
# se "SE_0819"
# imagealpha 0 1 1
# imagepos 0 0 0

# imagealpha 0 0 1
# waitandnext 1.5

;;1コマ
# bgm "bgm035" 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0.8
# imagepos 1 0 0
# waitandnext 1.5

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_7_0001"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 2 1 0.5
# imagepos 2 0 0

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_7_0002"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 1 0.5
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 2.1

# se "SE_0600"

;;進む
# imagealpha 1 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 1 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 2 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 2 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 3 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 3 0 500 0.4
# waitandnext 0.4

;;2コマ
# imagealpha 4 1 0.6
# imagepos 4 0 -500
# imagemoveto 4 0 0 0.4
# waitandnext 0.8

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_7_0003"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 5 1 0.5
# imagepos 5 0 100
# imagemoveto 5 0 0 0.5

;;セリフ
# se "SE_6520"
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_7_0004"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 6 1 0.5
# imagepos 6 0 100
# imagemoveto 6 0 0 0.5
# waitandnext 1.4

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_7_0005"
# waitandnext 0.2

# imagealpha 7 1 0.5
# imagepos 7 0 0

;;進む
# imagealpha 4 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 4 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 5 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 5 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 6 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 6 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 7 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 7 0 500 0.4
# waitandnext 0.4

;;3コマ
# imagealpha 8 1 0.6
# imagepos 8 0 -500
# imagemoveto 8 0 0 0.4
# waitandnext 1

;;上書き
# imageset 1 "Manga_09_3_1"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 10
# imagescale 1 0.9 0
# imageset 2 "Manga_09_3_2"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 10
# imagescale 2 0.9 0
# imageset 3 "Manga_09_4_0"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 8
# imagescale 3 0.9 0
# imageset 4 "Manga_09_4_1"
# imagealpha 4 0 0
# imagelayer 4 10
# imagescale 4 0.9 0
# imageset 5 "Manga_09_4_2"
# imagealpha 5 0 0
# imagelayer 5 10
# imagescale 5 0.9 0
# imageset 6 "Manga_09_4_3"
# imagealpha 6 0 0
# imagelayer 6 10
# imagescale 6 0.9 0
# imageset 7 "Manga_09_4_4"
# imagealpha 7 0 0
# imagelayer 7 10
# imagescale 7 0.9 0
# imageset 0 "Manga_09_4_5"
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imagelayer 0 10
# imagescale 0 0.9 0
;;セリフ
# se "SE_6502"
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_7_0006"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 1 1 0.5
# imagepos 1 0 100
# imagemoveto 1 0 0 0.5

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_7_0007"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 2 1 0.5
# imagepos 2 0 100
# imagemoveto 2 0 0 0.5

;;進む
# imagealpha 8 0 0.5

# imagealpha 1 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 1 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 2 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 2 0 500 0.4

;;4コマ
# imagealpha 3 1 15
# imagepos 3 0 -500
# imagemoveto 3 0 0 0.4
# waitandnext 1

;;セリフ
# se "SE_0626"
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_7_0008"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 4 1 0.5
# imagepos 4 0 0
# waitandnext 2.9

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_7_0009"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 6 1 0.5
# imagepos 6 0 0
# waitandnext 1.5

;;セリフ

# imagealpha 5 1 1.5
# imagepos 5 0 0
# waitandnext 2

# imagealpha 7 1 1.5
# imagepos 7 0 0

# imagealpha 0 1 1.5
# imagepos 0 0 0

# fadeout "black" 2
# waitandnext 2.5
